6.name: the giant rat
6.lookDescription: watches you with its dark beady eyes

64.name: the black panther
64.lookDescription: crouches before you, ready to pounce

65.name: the monkey
65.inDescription: drops down out of a tree
65.lookDescription: peers at you from behind a treetrunk

81.name: the weasel
conv: Pops up its head and looks around
Eyes you suspiciously as if you are up to no good
Scurries arround in a series of little springy jumps

112.name: Erik
112.lookDescription: snarls at you, having been woken from his hangover.

118.lookDescription: kneels before the bonfire rubbing his hands.
118.name: Njalmir

139.name: the fur trapper
conv: I'm only a fake fur trapper|Fur as in furry|What?
Yes, I agree|Er...yes|Heck yeah|I hadn't thought of that|You may be right
My traps are never very successful|I keep trying to trap things and they keep getting away|I make the world's least successful traps
That's a great question|What indeed|I don't know|No idea
I seem to be standing next to a pile of rubble, but have no idea how this happened|Rubble, you say?|Rubble trouble|Well, this is a fine mess
139.lookDescription: watches you suspiciously from amongst the trees.

165.lookDescription: Wearing rough clothes and a hood the beggar rests uneasily against a wall|The beggar is a gaunt hooded figure in rough clothing|A shabby looking fellow wearing rough clothing. His face is obscured by a hood
165.name: the beggar
conv: Consideration for a poor man|Have pity upon a humble wretch|Mercy on a poor man. He slowly stretches out his hand towards you
I'm not inclined to assist one such as yourself
I have no advice for you
I don't know anything about that

166.name: the black raven
conv: locates a vantage point with a clear line of sight|finds a perch from which to view the area|uses its accute sense of sight|swivels its head a few times to scan the enivonment
166.inDescription: hops in|swoops in|flies in and perches
166.outDescription: flies off|takes to the air and is gone|flutters off
166.lookDescription: watches you through one beady eye

215.name: the imp
conv: The imp notices a few things
215.inDescription: walks in, cleaning and polishing|trundles in|arrives|wanders in
215.lookDescription: The imp hums and fusses about the state of this place|The imp stands grinning at you cheekily|The imp is doing some kind of impish dance|The imp hovers and observes anyone passing by

303.name: the one-armed zombie
303.lookDescription: A shambolic figure with a single arm. It gazes mindlessly at you.

336.lookDescription: The crawler zombie looks vaguely like it was previously some kind of human, but it has no legs and its upper body is extensively decayed. It pulls its tattered torso around with its arms in a grotesque manner.
336.name: the crawler zombie

337.lookDescription: The grey zombie is thin, with ragged scraps of dusty clothing draping from it. turns slowly to follow you.
337.name: the grey zombie

339.name: the pruple zombie
339.lookDescription: Putrid smoke rises from the chest of the purple zombie. Its face seems almost entirely decayed with unrecognizable features.

340.name: the green zombie
340.lookDescription: A lurid shade of green, the zombie barely manages to stand and its dark eye sockets stare vacantly in your direction.

380.name: the knight
380.inDescription: arrives with a clanking of armor

405.name: the old inn-keeper
conv: We don't have any left|None left. We sold out|Out of stock at present
I wish that creatures would tidy up after themselves
The darts club is every wednesday
We don't serve wine in this establishment, only ale|Ale only, I'm afraid|It's ale or nothing
This weapon may come in handy on your adventures
I might get around to playing it, but I'm too busy|I've vaguely heard of it|Don't do much gaming myself. Too busy|I don't have time for games|Isn't that some ancient thing nobody plays anymore?
405.lookDescription: stands behind the bar, pulling ugly faces

524.name: the giant snake
524.lookDescription: The giant snake looks like an anaconda. Its forked tongue flicking in and out. Its reptillian eyes observe you suspiciously.

536.lookDescription: The giant rat stands before you squeaking and showing its teeth
536.name: the giant rat

678.name: the librarian
conv: I don't think we have that title
We are not lending at this time
There are many to choose from
We have new scrolls and old scrolls
Good literature is the best intoxicant
678.lookDescription: stands here, keeping you away from his precious books

811.name: the monk
811.lookDescription: The monk stands devout in prayer

840.name: the hermit
840.lookDescription: stands hunched, smiling as he watches the world pass him slowly by

867.name: the ogre
867.inDescription: wanders in looking for heads to break
867.lookDescription: stands here looking for heads to break, in his mighty arms he is

877.inDescription: pads up towards you, sniffing the air
877.lookDescription: watches you cautiously from a distance
877.name: the bear

946.inDescription: wanders in, cropping grass as it goes
946.lookDescription: is here, chewing the cud quietly. The goat is
946.name: the goat

1104.lookDescription: crouches before you, eyeing you suspiciously
1104.name: the wolf

1373.name: the stone golem
1373.outDescription: turns and strides off to the

1374.name: rider on horseback
1374.lookDescription: The rider on a dappled brown horse looks like the inn-keeper's son and is giving people rides between the high street and the inn. Perhaps this free transportation is useful for removing troublemakers.
conv: You climb into position behind The rider and they take you to the high street
You climb into position behind The rider and they take you to the hatchet inn

1375.name: cloaked rider on horseback
1375.lookDescription: The rider on a grey horse wears a long black cloak to keep off the rain. Only their skeletal hands are occasionally visible.

1104.inDescription: wanders in|slinks in|casually walks in and sits
1104.lookDescription: The cat watches you with half open eyes|The cat glances at you, then looks away again|The cat is sitting with its paws tucked under its body
1104.name: the black cat
conv: Finds a dark corner and disappears into it
Watches you curiously|Purrs|Yawns|Sits with their feet tucked under
Sits with their paws outstretched|Twitches their ears back
Sits and licks one of their paws|Twitches their whiskers
Sniffs at an object|Pricks up their ears

1105.name: the chicken
conv: The chicken pauses to look at you for a moment, then continues pecking the ground.
1105.outDescription: wanders out|ruffles its feathers and trots off|flutters off
1105.lookDescription: The chicken continues pecking, disregarding you entirely|The chicken scratches at the ground with its foot|The chicken looks around, as if startled

1106.name: the sheep
1106.lookDescription: The sheep stands around looking bored|The sheep chews and looks blankly at you
